Property Details
We are happy to offer this beautiful and bright Double Studio apartment in Caledonian Road , Islington, N1

The property consists of:
*Double studio apartment with a large kitchen
*Large bathroom
*Further benefits include wood floors, double glazed windows
*The flats is offered in good condition
*The apartment is located within a short walk from Kings Cross, Caledonian road Overground and Caledonian road underground
